#summary Descriptions and examples of class-level tags supported by Ext-Doc.

= Introduction =

Several tags are best defined at the class-level as they describe the class in specific detail. These include:

  * @class
  * @namespace
  * @extends
  * @singleton
  * @cfg
  * @constructor and @param


== 1.0 @class ==

Example:
{{{
/*
 * @class MyClassName A description of MyClassName
 * /
}}}

== 1.1 @namespace ==

Example:
{{{
/*
 * @class SamplePackage.MyClassName A description of MyClassName
 * @namespace SamplePackage
 * /
}}}

== 1.2 @extends ==

Example:
{{{
/*
 * @class MyClassName A description of MyClassName
 * @extends ParentClass
 * /
}}}

== 1.3 @singleton ==

Example:
{{{
/*
 * @class MyClassName A description of MyClassName
 * @singleton
 * /
}}}

== 1.4 @cfg ==

Example:
{{{
/*
 * @class MyClassName A description of MyClassName
 * @cfg {type} option A description of the configuration option
 * /
}}}

== 1.5 @constructor ==

Example:
{{{
/*
 * @class MyClassName A description of MyClassName
 * @constructor
 * @param {type} myParameter A description of the parameter
 * /
}}}
